item.title: 欧盟：苹果操作系统 iPadOS 必须符合欧盟《数字市场法
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一表示，苹果公司必须确保其操作系统 iPadOS 符合欧盟《数字市场法》（DMA）规定的所有相关义务。【原文：Apple must ensure its operating system iPadOS complies with all relevant obligations under the European Union's Digital Markets Act (DMA), the European Commission said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞标艾奥瓦州的异常数据和薪资水平带来困惑
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）结束对 411,000 多辆福特汽车动力损失的调查
item.description: 美国安全监管机构周一表示，已经结束了对约 411,315 辆福特 SUV 和皮卡车动力损失的调查。【原文：The U.S. safety regulator said on Monday it has closed a probe into an estimated 411,315 Ford SUVs and pickup trucks over a loss of motive power.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税将重新安排贸易流向、提高成本并招致报复
item.description: 爱荷华州农民鲍勃-海姆萨特（Bob Hemesath）担心，如果唐纳德-特朗普赢得周二的总统大选，并兑现迅速对中国商品征收 60% 关税、对所有其他进口商品征收至少 10% 关税的誓言，美国农业将付出沉重代价。【原文：Iowa farmer Bob Hemesath is worried that U.S. agriculture will pay dearly if Donald Trump wins Tuesday's presidential election and makes good on a vow to swiftly impose a 60% tariff on Chinese goods and at least a 10% levy on all other imports.】

item.title: 在不断变化的气候中，零售商转向天气战略
item.description: 沃尔玛等大牌零售商正越来越多地利用分析技术来消除购物中最难以预测的业绩变量之一：天气的影响。【原文：Big-name retailers such as Walmart are increasingly using analytics to blunt the impact of one of the most unpredictable performance variables of shopping: weather.】

item.title: 对交易商而言，监管混乱将削弱特朗普的亲商倾向
item.description: 如果换成其他任何一位总统，减少监管和降低企业税率的承诺都会让华尔街的交易机器垂涎欲滴。而唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能就任总统后，情况就不一样了。【原文：With any other president, promises of less regulation and lower corporate taxes would have Wall Street's deal machine salivating at the prospect of a feeding frenzy. Not so with a potential Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 波音工人就可能结束罢工的工资协议进行投票
item.description: 波音美国西海岸工厂的工人将于周一就一份改进后的合同要约进行投票，该要约可能会结束为期七周的罢工，并重新启动这家陷入困境的飞机制造商的喷气机生产。【原文：Boeing U.S. West Coast factory workers will hold a vote on an improved contract offer on Monday that could end a seven-week strike and restart jet production at the troubled planemaker.】

item.title: Facebook 和 Nvidia 请求美国最高法院免于证券欺诈诉讼
item.description: 美国最高法院将审议两家科技巨头--Meta's Facebook 和 Nvidia--在不同案件中抵御联邦证券欺诈诉讼的请求，这可能会使私人诉讼当事人更难追究公司的责任。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court is set to consider bids by two tech giants - Meta's Facebook and Nvidia - to fend off federal securities fraud lawsuits in separate cases that could make it harder for private litigants to hold companies to account.】

item.title: 对冲基金的流动 高盛集团称，对冲基金 10 月份受到欧洲股市的冲击
item.description: 据路透社周一看到的一份高盛（Goldman Sachs）周五发给客户的说明显示，受更广泛的市场抛售拖累，专注于欧洲股市的对冲基金在 10 月份遭遇了一年多来最大的月度亏损。【原文：Hedge funds focused on European stock markets suffered their largest monthly losses in over a year in October, dragged down by a broader market sell off, according to a Goldman Sachs note sent to clients on Friday and seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 美国大选日临近，特朗普媒体交易员为波动做好准备
item.description: 特朗普传媒过山车式的股价在某种程度上代表了共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普的当选机会。现在，交易商们终于迎来了他们的清算日。【原文：Trump Media's roller-coaster share price has served as something of a proxy for Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump's chances of election. Now traders are finally at their day of reckoning.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司斥资 8.35 亿美元升级远程空客 A350 客舱
item.description: 新加坡航空公司周一表示，将斥资11亿新元（约合8.3466亿美元），在2030年底前升级41架空客A350-900远程和超远程飞机的所有舱位。【原文：Singapore Airlines will spend 1.1 billion Singapore dollars ($834.66 million) to upgrade all classes on its 41 Airbus A350-900 long-haul and ultra-long-range planes by the end of 2030, the airline said on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉 10 月中国产电动汽车销量同比下降 5.3
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周一公布的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）10月份在中国销售了68280辆电动汽车，同比下降5.3%。【原文：U.S. automaker Tesla sold 68,280 China-made electric vehicles in October, down 5.3% from a year earlier, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，安巴尼的 Reliance Jio 将于 2025 年首次公开募股，零售业的首次亮相要晚得多
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，印度亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的目标是其电信业务 Jio 于 2025 年在孟买上市，分析师对该公司的估值超过 1000 亿美元。【原文：Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani targets a 2025 Mumbai listing for his telecom business Jio, valued by analysts at over $100 billion, and plans to launch his retail unit's IPO much later, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧元区 10 月份制造业采购经理人指数显示低迷态势有企稳迹象
item.description: 欧元区制造业在 10 月份出现了一些企稳迹象，虽然制造业活动连续 28 个月萎缩，但萎缩速度有所放缓。【原文：Euro zone manufacturing showed some signs of stabilisation in October as while activity contracted for a 28th month it did so at a shallower pace, according to a survey which showed an ongoing decline in demand had also eased.】

item.title: 有报道称 Moncler 正在考虑收购巴宝莉，巴宝莉股价因此大涨
item.description: 有媒体报道称，意大利奢侈外衣制造商 Moncler 正在考虑竞购这家英国奢侈品零售商，随后 Burberry 股价周一上涨了 7.5%。【原文：Burberry shares rose 7.5% on Monday after a media report said Italian luxury outerwear maker Moncler was considering a bid for the British luxury retailer.】

item.title: Ifo发现德国企业招聘计划降至四年新低
item.description: 德国伊福研究所（Ifo Institute）周一的数据显示，德国企业雇佣新员工的意愿比四年多来任何时候都要低，因为欧洲最大经济体的疲软给该国劳动力市场留下了印记。【原文：German companies are less willing to hire new staff than at any point in more than four years, data from the Ifo institute showed on Monday, as weakness in Europe's largest economy has left its mark on the country's labour market.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车 10 月份销量同比增长 3
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周一表示，10月份该公司汽车销量同比增长3%，达到61686辆，这主要得益于全电动和插电式混合动力车型在欧洲销量的增长。【原文：Volvo Cars' sales rose 3% year-on-year in October to 61,686 cars driven primarily by an increase in sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid models in Europe, the Sweden-based automaker said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构将于 12 月 6 日前就诺和诺德收购康泰伦特一事做出决定
item.description: 据欧盟委员会网站周一发布的一份文件显示，欧盟反垄断监管机构将在12月6日前决定是否批准诺和诺德控股公司（Novo Holdings）收购合同药品生产商康泰伦特公司（Catalent）的交易。【原文：EU antitrust regulators will decide by Dec. 6 whether to clear Novo Holdings' acquisition of contract drug manufacturer Catalent , according to a filing on the European Commission website on Monday.】

item.title: 瑞安航空上半年利润因票价下跌而下降 18%，但价格疲软势头有所缓和
item.description: 廉价航空公司瑞安航空（Ryanair）周一表示，在截至 9 月的 6 个月里，平均票价下降了 10%，导致上半年利润同比下降 18%，但本季度的预订量看起来很强劲，票价疲软的趋势也有所缓和。【原文：Budget airline Ryanair said on Monday that average fares fell 10% in the six months ended September, leading to an 18% year-on-year fall in first-half profit, but its current quarter bookings looked strong and ticket price weakness was moderating.】

item.title: Blackstone 在全球财富推动中瞄准新的欧洲市场
item.description: Blackstone 的两位高管告诉路透社，该公司的私人财富业务计划明年至少进入两个新的欧洲市场，以满足富裕阶层日益增长的需求。【原文：Blackstone's private wealth business plans to enter at least two new European markets next year to tap growing demand among the well-off, two executives at the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 早间竞价爱荷华州意外事件令美元震荡
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国尼奥计划仅在海外销售其首款混合动力汽车
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，中国电动汽车制造商尼奥计划于2026年推出首款混合动力车型，并将只在海外市场销售，包括中东、北非和欧洲。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Nio is planning to launch its first hybrid model in 2026 and will only sell it in overseas markets, including the Middle East, North Africa and Europe, according to two people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国科技公司警告越南计划出台的法律将阻碍数据中心和社交媒体的发展
item.description: 美国科技公司警告越南政府，一项收紧数据保护规则和限制数据向国外转移的法律草案将阻碍社交媒体平台和数据中心运营商在越南发展业务。【原文：U.S. tech companies have warned Vietnam's government that a draft law to tighten rules on data protection and limit data transfers abroad would hamper social media platforms and data centre operators from growing their businesses in the country.】

item.title: 澳大利亚警方就税务泄露调查搜查悉尼普华永道办公室
item.description: 澳大利亚警方周一搜查了位于悉尼的普华永道澳大利亚办事处，以调查一名前合伙人向该公司及其客户泄露政府机密税收计划一事。【原文：Australian police on Monday searched the PwC Australia office in Sydney as part of a probe into a former partner who leaked confidential government tax plans to the firm and its clients.】

item.title: 澳大利亚取消洛克希德-马丁公司军用卫星项目
item.description: 澳大利亚取消了与洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）价值数十亿美元的军事卫星项目，国防部周一发表声明称，军方将把重点转向多轨道系统。【原文：Australia has cancelled a multi-billion dollar military satellite project with Lockheed Martin , with a Department of Defence statement on Monday saying the military will instead shift its focus to a multi-orbit system.】

item.title: SK董事长称，Nvidia的Huang要求SK海力士提前6个月供应HBM4芯片
item.description: SK集团董事长Chey Tae-won周一表示，英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋要求内存芯片制造商SK海力士将名为HBM4的下一代高带宽内存芯片（HBM）的供应提前六个月。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang asked memory chip maker SK Hynix to bring forward the supply of its next-generation high-bandwidth memory chips (HBM) called HBM4 by six months, SK Group chairman Chey Tae-won said on Monday.】

item.title: 本周事件频发，市场为美国大选摊牌做好准备
item.description: 周一，金融市场在谨慎的气氛中开始了新的一周，亚洲股市低迷，而美元则在繁忙的美国总统大选即将到来之前略有回落。【原文：Financial markets began the week on a cautious note on Monday, with shares in Asia subdued while the dollar eased slightly ahead of a busy week headlined by the U.S. presidential race which is set to come down to the wire.】

item.title: 欧佩克+推迟增产，油价上涨逾 1 美元
item.description: 在欧佩克+周日表示将把 12 月份的增产计划推迟一个月后，油价在周一早盘上涨了 1 美元以上。【原文：Oil prices rose by more than $1 in early trading on Monday after OPEC+ said on Sunday it would delay a planned December output hike by one month.】

item.title: 法国为欧盟集团辩护，中国敦促欧盟提供可接受的电动汽车贸易解决方案
item.description: 中国敦促法国推动欧盟委员会达成中欧电动汽车行业均可接受的解决方案，而法国则表示，在推动推翻白兰地关税的过程中，欧盟不会在关键问题上让步。【原文：China has urged France to push the European Commission towards a solution acceptable to both the European and Chinese electric vehicle industries, while France said the bloc would not yield on key matters as it pushes to overturn a tariff on brandy.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称，三菱公司和日产汽车将成立合资公司，开发自动驾驶汽车和电动汽车电池
item.description: 据日本《读卖新闻》周一报道，日本三菱公司和日产汽车公司决定成立一家合资企业，为自动驾驶和将电动汽车电池用作蓄电池提供相关服务。【原文：Japan's Mitsubishi Corp and Nissan have decided to establish a joint venture to provide services related to autonomous driving and using electric vehicle batteries as storage batteries, the Yomiuri newspaper reported on Monday.】
